means: 夕护晓；三耠基甘油；耐绞宁

word_mean: 硝酸甘油：C3H5N3O9，无色至黄色液体，由硝酸和硫酸作用于甘油制得。敲击时会爆炸，但与甘露醇制成片剂则变得安全。法定的制剂〔USP〕主要用于预防与治疗心绞痛，舌下给药

sentence.Network_en: Nitroglycerin is obtained by nitrating glycerol.
sentence.Network_cn: 硝化甘油是经过硝化丙三醇得来的.

sentence.Network_en: Smokeless powder refers to colloided nitrocellulose either alone or in admixture with nitroglycerin or other material.
sentence.Network_cn: 无烟药是指单独的胶质硝化棉或与硝化甘油和其它物质形成的混合物.

sentence.Network_en: Nitrocotton and nitroglycerin are mixed for five minutes to form a relatively thick gel.
sentence.Network_cn: 硝化棉和硝化甘油混合五分钟,形成相当稠的胶.

entry.tran: 硝化甘油;甘油三硝酸酯
entry.def: Nitroglycerin is a liquid that is used to make explosives and also in some medicines.

means.word_mean: 1. a heavy yellow poisonous oily explosive liquid obtained by nitrating glycerol; used in making explosives and medically as a vasodilator (trade names Nitrospan and Nitrostat)
